skit.title: Belastende Lüge (Deutsch)
skit.description: Link: http://i.imgur.com/efnaEa8.jpg Da ich schon einen Tales of RPG gemacht habe, dachte ich mir, nehme ich hierfür eine Szene raus. Es spielt mehr in der Tales of Symphonia Welt. Anira ist eine Halbelfe, die der Gruppe zufällig traf und einen aus der Gruppe half. Natürlich erzählte sie nicht, sie sei eine Halbelfe, sondern eine Elfe. Das belastet sie natürlich, da die Gruppe wirklich sehr freundlich ist und sie ungerne solche Menschen anlügen mag. Also ging sie raus, um ihe Gedanken zu sammeln, aber da kommt ihr die Auserwählte entgegen und sie kann ihre Gedanken nicht zuende führen. Obs am ende noch herauskommt, dass sie eine Halbelfe ist? Wirds gut ausgehn? Wäre da nochmehr Platz für Skits gewesen, hätte ich da um einiges mehr gemacht, soviel ist klar.

skit.title: Scambi Zodiacali? (italiano)
Scambi Zodiacali? (italiano)
skit.description:
Link: http://imgur.com/lno2agm
Ciao a tutti! Consegnare all'ultimo momento causa esami... devo sempre farmi riconoscere... coff... XD Vabbè, ho fatto questa skit usando alcuni dei miei O.C., spero vi piaccia, anche senza riferimenti diretti a Tales ^w^ Non vedo l'ora che arrivi da noi il nuovo titolo!! Tempo, passa in fretta!! >w<
Hello everybody! I would like to post a translation here, but is too long and doesn't fit... I'm so sorry çwç The true is that there is also a pun that can't be translate so well in english... the zodiac signs are called Vergine(Virgo) and Gemelli(Gemini) by italians, but those 2 words also mean Virgin and Twins... so, if you try to translate it on your own, remember that, or you'll not understan the "misunderstanding" of Jade! ^^ Hope you enjoy it! XD

skit.title: La victoire de Mieu! (FRENCH)
skit.description:
VERSION PLUS GRANDE//FULL PICTURE: http://i.imgur.com/EdTrP5A.jpg
Pfou! J'ai finalement fini! J'ai dû dessiner avec ma souris de la main droite, bien que je suis gauchère...! J'ai choisi de faire ceci dans ma langue maternelle. --- Phew! Finally finished! I had to draw this with my mouse with my right hand even though I'm left handed! I chose to do this in my native language (French). ---
ENGLISH TRANSLATION:
*Luke and Colette are talking* *Mieu runs towards them*
Mieu: Mieu, Mieu!! You guys! I'm in a competition, and I might just win! Colette: Oh~~! I am very happy for you, Mieu! Good luck! Luke: Whaat?! How could someone that burnt down his own forest win something?!
Mieu: Heehee! You'll be surprised, master! I'll finally get the spotlight! Luke: Yeah, ofcourse... Colette: Like Luke said! I'm sure it'll go well!
*The lint says: 'the most annoying' *

skit.title: That's so Raven (ENGLISH)
skit.description: http://imgur.com/3LDjOHn. Hey, thank you for caring enough to check my skit out! I attempted the water-color style as shown in the Japanese covers in Tales of games, and brought forth the first few Tales of characters along with the popular ones in America. I suggest checking out the imgurl link for the full quality version of it. It was a little challenging trying to fit all of the character's traits into one skit, but hopefully, you'll still enjoy it. thank you for your time! Enjoy!

skit.title: Better With Age (ENGLISH)
skit.description:
Full view here: http://i.imgur.com/apjsu3g.jpg
Hello! I really love the Tales series, so I tried to include a lot of Tales-related jokes in this comic. (In the forth panel, Rowen is wearing his Barbatos Goetia cameo costume, in case you didn't recognize it, haha.)
I tried to mimic the style of Tales skit faces. I'm really bad at drawing older men (why did I pick this topic!?) and with the deadline coming up quickly, I referenced from some official skit portraits to make sure Rowen looked accurate. Panel 4 is a parody of Rowen's hi-ougi cut-in, drawn by me. Background, text box style, and icons were made from scratch, in the style of Tales of Xillia.
Like the title suggests, I believe that the Tales series and community only gets better with age! Thanks for reading, and let's look forward to Tales of Xillia together!

skit.title: Il Toro Ammucchiato/The Piled Bull (Italiano/With english translation) Sterni Cristiano
skit.description: Piccola Gag basata su una storia vera XD I disegni sono quelli che sono, non sono una cima a disegnare,spero vi piacerà! Based on a true story and on an italian pun between the words"Mucchio"and"Mucca"! Translation:Pascal:Look Sophie-chan a"Heaappp"!(I have to cheer her up somehow!)[Arrow:Heap] Sophie:...(Bored) Pascal:Look at how"large","big","brown",... it is! (Arrows:"Large","Big","Brown") Sophie:...(Yawn followed by boredom) Sophie:...look...it also has a nice pair of horns... Pascal:...ehhhh? Pascal: Whaaattt? What are you saying? Horns? Where? You're having hallucinations? I can't see any horns... Maybe, is not that you feel sick? This will explain your bad mood! You caught a cold? Stomachache ...? Sophie:...(Doubtful glance) Sophie: But the "Heap"(Mucchio) is not the male of the "Cow"(Mucca)?(Kawaii Glance) Pascal:...(Petrified)... Hope you liked it even if is difficul to understand for a non-native speaker, and sorry for the art but I'm not very good at drawing XD http://imgur.com/OpGrVPm

skit.title: Afternoon Expedition [ENGLISH]
skit.description:
Here's the link to full size skit http://imgur.com/drjzFyD
Wow this was a lot of fun and work! This was a collab of my friend and I, we came up with the story, my friend wrote the lines for the characters and I drew the visuals. I had a rush the colouring a bit since I caught cold and was running out of time, but it was still lots of fun to do:D The non-Tales character, Meri, is a mascot character of the small Tales fanclub we have here in our country. We are so happy to be able to play Tales games too even though they are not in our language.
We hope you like the skit as much as we enjoyed making it:) Can't wait for Xillia and the ToS Chronicles~

skit.title: The New Chosen? (English)
skit.description: http://imgur.com/cINtr5j I know it isn't really lighthearted, but I just really wanted to focus on two possible what-ifs in Symphonia: What if Lloyd ended up being possessed by Mithos? And at the same time, what would happen to Seles after Zelos' betrayal in the Tower of Salvation? I hope you enjoy it~ (And I hope that I didn't make it too painful...)

Ha ha ha. *PowHammer'd* The skit features Milla from Tales of Xillia, Zelos from Tales of Symphonia, Tear from Tales of the Abyss, Baba-san and myself. Enjoy and hope you like it!

skit.title: "Me remplir l'estomac, telle est ma mission" ( Français )
skit.description:
Full view: http://imgur.com/nj3uSKf Français : Bonjour à tous ! Voilà ma petite participation ! N'oubliez pas de préparer un petit encas pour Milla et toute l'équipe lorsqu'ils débarqueront chez vous ! Il est dur de se battre le ventre vide ;)
English: Hi everyone! Here's my entry for this nice skit contest! Translation: - 1rst panel: Leia: We're finally coming to the West! I can't stand still, I'm really looking forward to it! // Jude: Leia, please calm down a bit, will you? - 2nd panel: Jude: But I understand how you're feeling. I'm glad to meet Western players soon! - 3rd panel: Yes, I am looking forward to discovering new places too... Especially France. // Leia: Why France in particular? - 4th panel: Because I cannot wait to taste French cuisine! It is said to be the best one in the world! I am already salivating... // Jude & Leia: ... What? - 5th panel : Sometimes, I wonder what is Milla's most distinctive feature: her strong sense of duty or her insatiable appetite?
skit.title: "Me remplir l'estomac, telle est ma mission" ( Français )
skit.description:
Full view: http://imgur.com/nj3uSKf Français : Bonjour à tous ! Voilà ma petite participation ! N'oubliez pas de préparer un petit encas pour Milla et toute l'équipe lorsqu'ils débarqueront chez vous ! Il est dur de se battre le ventre vide ;)
English: Hi everyone! Here's my entry for this nice skit contest! Translation: - 1rst panel: Leia: We're finally coming to the West! I can't stand still, I'm really looking forward to it! // Jude: Leia, please calm down a bit, will you? - 2nd panel: Jude: But I understand how you're feeling. I'm glad to meet Western players soon! - 3rd panel: Yes, I am looking forward to discovering new places too... Especially France. // Leia: Why France in particular? - 4th panel: Because I cannot wait to taste French cuisine! It is said to be the best one in the world! I am already salivating... // Jude & Leia: ... What? - 5th panel : Sometimes, I wonder what is Milla's most distinctive feature: her strong sense of duty or her insatiable appetite?

skit.title: Summon Support! Summon Friends! (ENGLISH)
skit.description:
Imgur: http://i.imgur.com/ZJF8tHy.jpg
Just a fun little skit featuring various mascots...and one of my favorite character in the whole series!
I got to know the Tales series when my friend first introduced me to Tales of Phantasia over 12 years ago, and since then I've met many other wonderful friends through this series. As an avid fan of the series I really hope Producer Baba will continue to keep bringing this amazing series here to the West!

skit.title: L'arrivée de Mila et Jude (Français / French)
skit.description:
http://i.imgur.com/K2SYLR6.jpg Cybill L.
L'arrivée de Mila et Jude The arrival of Mila and Jude
Mighty : Héhé les mecs, j'ai préparé une belle fête pour la jolie Mila ! Je compte sur vous pour bien l'accueillir ! Hehe guys, I prepared a beautiful feast for the beautiful Mila! I count on you to properly welcome!
Zélos : Compte sur moi ! Count on me!
Mint : D'accord Monsieur Migthy. Ok M. Migthy.
Patty : Et Jude ? Arrête de penser qu'aux filles idiot ! C'est Jude qui mène la barque ! And Judas? Stop thinking as girls! Idiot ! Jude is the chief!
Guy (à lui-même/ to himself) : Haha alors pourquoi est-ce Mila qu'on voit dans les trailers Patty ?) Haha then why Mila is in the all trailers Patty?)

skit.title: Tales of Provini (ITALIANO)
skit.description:
Tales of Provini - (Tales of audition) Follow the link to see the original work: http://i.imgur.com/LZNfnv0.jpg I hope you enjoy :)
- Translation -
Teepo: Welcome at "Tales of Audition"! Here, we're trying to find new characters for the coming "Tales of..." title. Who are you? What's your competence? What's your experience in the videogame's world?
Bobo: Hey pal! I'm the great Bobo! I really wish to became the next main character of a "Tales of..." title.
Teepo: Mister Bobo, at a first look, you don't seem a good character for us. I suggest you to take place in some childish game! I'm sure that you have talent, but our answer is: no.
Bobo: How you dare treat me like this?! Do you now who i am, stupid idiot?! I'm BOBO! I have defeated so many enemies that you can't even imagine! I'm the main characters of many videogames! I'd really like to know what you would be like without BOBO. Farewell!
Teepo: ... ...... I want to change job.

skit.title: Una "calda" estate (Italian)
skit.description:
Ecco il mio lavoro! Spero vi piaccia! Grazie mille a Namco e a Baba-san per aver deciso di localizzare Xillia e per credere nei fan italiani, traducendo il gioco anche nella nostra lingua! Non vedo l'ora che sia Agosto! http://i.imgur.com/5EhsMZJ.jpg
(English translation)
Emil: Aaah, summer is finally coming. Right, Marta? Marta: Yes, Emil! And you know what that means?
Emil: Of course! I’m looking forward to going on a two-week holiday in the mountains. Marta: What? Mountains?!
Marta: I was sure you wanted to go to the beach. I even bought myself a nice two-piece swimsuit, just for you… Emil: B-Beach? Two-piece?! J-Just for me?!
Marta: Let’s see… I could line and cover it with some Yeti’s fur… A cavewoman costume could actually be even better… Emil: *gulp!*
Marta: I didn't expect you were the wild type, but if those are your preferences, I’ll do what I can to satisfy you, my darling. Emil: W-W-WHAT THE HECK ARE YOU TALKIN’ ABOUT?! WHAT KIND OF HOLIDAYS HAVE YOU IN MIND?!

skit.description:
HUHU ES HAT MIR VIEL FREUDE BEREITET; DAS SKIT ZU ZEICHNEN UND ZU MALEN. SO VIEL FREUDE; DASS ES NUN MEIN VIERTER VERSUCH IST HAHAHAHAHA ICH WAR NIE GANZ ZUFRIEDEN ICH HOFFE DIESES GEFÄLLT EUCH NUN BESSER UND AUCH HIDEO BABA ^:^ VIELEN DANK AN ALL MEINE FREUNDE; DIE BIS JETZT FÜR MICH GEVOTET HABEN OHNE EINE GEGENLEISTUNG. DANKE AN ALLE, DIE VOTEN WOLLTEN ABER ETWAS SCHIEF GEGANGEN IST UND NATÜRLICH AN ALLE, DIE NOCH LIKEN WERDEN HAB EUCH LIEB :)
DAS IST DER DIREKTLINK http://i.imgur.com/3KcGAGB.jpg
